body:
So well, i've been here for 5/6 months. Some of you might not know me. But i guss you'll know more about me now! :p

Hey, i'm Ludcha. I'm 13 and i'm from Stockholm, Sweden. I love food, floorball, girls, OCN and my BC mates. 

And yeah i will also be announcing that i'm leaving the server for permanently. 
It's been a great ride. I got introduced to Bad Company by my fellow swedish mate Jiveh, and got a trial and joined. Our winning streak of 69/70 will probably hang on for a while, (i guess :p). 

And also, i want to deeply say sorry to PPB. For my saltyness!

So carry on asking me! :)

replies.body: Any plans of the future regarding floorball? :)

replies.body:
my career or the sport it self?

Well my career:

I'm going to atleast play this sport to my 20s. 

And the sport itself is going to grow, soon there will be like NFLL (National Floorball League) or something. Not sure, but the sport will grow

replies.body: How did you come up with your username?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with your username?

replies.body:
Well my first name i had here was ''theludcha'' which stands for me and my brothers names together. But with the 3 first letters of our name.

the(odore)lud(wig)cha(rlie)

And now it is only Ludcha
